name: Classic Chocolate Celebration Cake
description: Rich, moist chocolate cake layered with velvety chocolate buttercream. Perfect for birthdays and special celebrations. Made with premium Belgian cocoa and topped with elegant chocolate shavings.

name: Vanilla Dream Wedding Cake
description: Elegant three-tier vanilla sponge cake with fresh vanilla bean buttercream. Decorated with delicate sugar flowers and perfect for weddings or anniversaries.

name: Red Velvet Romance
description: Luxurious red velvet cake with classic cream cheese frosting. The perfect balance of cocoa and tang, finished with a velvety smooth texture that melts in your mouth.

name: Lemon Sunshine Cake
description: Bright and zesty lemon cake with fresh lemon curd filling and lemon buttercream. Garnished with candied lemon wheels and fresh berries for a burst of sunshine.

name: Strawberry Shortcake Supreme
description: Fresh strawberry cake layered with whipped cream and fresh strawberries. Light, airy sponge cake that celebrates the sweetness of summer berries.

name: Birthday Celebration Cupcakes
description: Dozen of colorful birthday cupcakes with vanilla cake base and rainbow buttercream swirls. Perfect for parties and celebrations. Each cupcake is individually decorated.

name: Chocolate Fudge Cupcakes
description: Rich chocolate cupcakes topped with decadent chocolate fudge frosting and a cherry on top. Made with premium cocoa for an intense chocolate experience.

name: Lemon Lavender Cupcakes
description: Delicate lemon cupcakes infused with culinary lavender and topped with honey lavender buttercream. An elegant and sophisticated flavor combination.

name: French Macarons Assortment
description: Elegant French macarons in assorted flavors including raspberry, chocolate, vanilla, and pistachio. Delicate almond shells with smooth ganache filling.

name: Classic Croissants
description: Buttery, flaky French croissants baked fresh daily. Perfect for breakfast or afternoon tea. Made with European-style butter for authentic flavor.

name: Fruit Danish Selection
description: Assorted fruit Danish pastries with flaky pastry base, cream cheese filling, and fresh fruit toppings. Available in cherry, blueberry, and apricot.

name: Chocolate Eclairs
description: Classic French eclairs filled with vanilla pastry cream and topped with rich chocolate glaze. Light choux pastry with a perfect cream-to-pastry ratio.
